title: RNAseq Euploid_neuron_E04
growth_protocol_ch1: All hPSCs were grown and maintained in mTeSR medium on geltrex coated plates; hPSC derived neurons were generated by transduction with Ngn2 ectopic expression constructs with the addition of SMAD inhibitors, WNT inhibitors and neurotrophins.
extract_protocol_ch1: For RNAseq, RNA was extracted using the AllPrep DNA/RNA/miRNA universal kit (Qiagen). For eCLIP-seq, cells were UV crosslinked, lysed, sonicated and treated with RNAse I followed by IP, processing and reverse transcripion using AffinityScript. cDNAs were adaptor ligated.
extract_protocol_ch1.1: For RNAseq, libraries were prepared using the Illumina TruSeq HS Stranded Total RNA kit with Ribo-Zero Gold for rRNA depletion. For eCLIP-seq, libraries were generated using Q5 PCR mix.
data_processing: Sequenced reads were assessed for low-quality sequence, then mapped against the GRCh38_98 transcriptome where reads were quantified at the transcript level using Salmon
data_processing.1: Transcript-level abundance estimates  from Salmon were collapsed to gene-leve estimates and  converted to raw count values using the R Bioconductor package tximport
data_processing.2: Differentially expressed genes were identified using the R Bioconductor package DESeq2
data_processing.4: Supplementary_files_format_and_content: comma separated file of raw count matrix where columns correspond to samples and rows correspond to genes; comma separated file of transcript per million counts where columns correspond to samples and rows correspond to genes

title: RNAseq FMR1_WT_neuron_G05
growth_protocol_ch1: All hPSCs were grown and maintained in mTeSR medium on geltrex coated plates; hPSC derived neurons were generated by transduction with Ngn2 ectopic expression constructs with the addition of SMAD inhibitors, WNT inhibitors and neurotrophins.
extract_protocol_ch1: For RNAseq, RNA was extracted using the AllPrep DNA/RNA/miRNA universal kit (Qiagen). For eCLIP-seq, cells were UV crosslinked, lysed, sonicated and treated with RNAse I followed by IP, processing and reverse transcripion using AffinityScript. cDNAs were adaptor ligated.
extract_protocol_ch1.1: For RNAseq, libraries were prepared using the Illumina TruSeq HS Stranded Total RNA kit with Ribo-Zero Gold for rRNA depletion. For eCLIP-seq, libraries were generated using Q5 PCR mix.
data_processing: Sequenced reads were assessed for low-quality sequence, then mapped against the GRCh38_98 transcriptome where reads were quantified at the transcript level using Salmon
data_processing.1: Transcript-level abundance estimates  from Salmon were collapsed to gene-leve estimates and  converted to raw count values using the R Bioconductor package tximport
data_processing.2: Differentially expressed genes were identified using the R Bioconductor package DESeq2
data_processing.4: Supplementary_files_format_and_content: comma separated file of raw count matrix where columns correspond to samples and rows correspond to genes; comma separated file of transcript per million counts where columns correspond to samples and rows correspond to genes
